name: Tennis Targets
description:
TENNIS TARGETS is a target shooting game, with catapult style controls.  Use McRacket 🎾 to hit the ball at the targets 🎯, but avoid the bombs 💣.  Gain points for hitting targets, but lose points for hitting bombs.  What's the best score you can get before the time runs out.  Share your best score with your friends.  Original graphics and cool sounds and music.  Simple controls, just touch and hold the racket to pull back in any direction and release to hit the ball.

FEATURES:

🎾 Animated character to play as.
🎵 Cool sound effects and music.
🕹️ Simple controls.
😲 The game gets harder the longer you survive.
💯 Share your best score and compete with friends.

DEVICE/CONTENT INFO:

🔹 Works on phones, tablets and Chromebooks (that support Android).
🔹 Small download size.
🔹 No notifications.
🔹 No in-app purchases.
🔹 No banner adverts distracting you during gameplay.
🔹 No permissions requested.
🔹 No personal data recorded or used.
🔹 No violent content, bad language or inappropriate adverts.

🆓 Tennis Targets is a 100% target shooting game and always will be, so download it today and get using McRacket like a catapult. 🆓

Please leave a rating in the playstore with your feedback.

If you like this game, please check out the other free games by Scaly Bob.
